title: Bronze equipment

properties.name: description
properties.value: Bronze equipment are items made from bronze metal. Bronze equipment is the weakest equipment in RuneScape. All bronze items are coloured brown. Bronze armour requires 1 Defence to wield, weapons require 1 Attack.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Bronze equipment
A player with bronze armour equipped.

Bronze equipment are items made from bronze metal. Bronze equipment is the weakest equipment in RuneScape. All bronze items are coloured brown. Bronze armour requires 1 Defence to wield, weapons require 1 Attack.

Contents

  • 1 Weapons
    • 1.1 One-handed melee weapons
    • 1.2 Two-handed melee weapons
    • 1.3 Ranged weapons and ammo
  • 2 Armour
  • 3 Other

Weapons[edit | edit source]

Bronze weapons require an Attack level of 1 to wield.

Armour[edit | edit source]

Bronze armour is the lowest quality armour in the standard spectrum of metal armours (bronze to dragon). Bronze armour requires 1 Defence to wear.

Other[edit | edit source]

Trimmed and gold-trimmed bronze armour have the same bonuses as standard bronze armour. These can be obtained from the member's only Treasure Trails minigame.

Note: Other players cannot trim or bless armour. Players claiming to do so are scammers.
